meanings.definition: An abnormally low level of oxygen in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hypoxemia after seeing low oxygen levels in the blood test.
meanings.sent2: Hypoxemia can be dangerous if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent3: The hypoxemia in the blood made the doctor raise an eyebrow in concern.
meanings.sent4: The hypoxemia in the blood was a silent threat, lurking undetected.
meanings.sent5: The hypoxemia in the blood painted a grim picture of the patient's health.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by deficient oxygenation of the blood.
meanings.sent1: The patient's hypoxemia was evident from the pale color of their skin.
meanings.sent2: Severe hypoxemia can lead to organ damage.
meanings.sent3: The hypoxemia in the blood played hide and seek with the doctor's diagnosis.
meanings.sent4: The hypoxemia in the blood was a heavy burden on the patient's body.
meanings.sent5: The hypoxemia in the blood was a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
